about_the_game:
If you can’t travel to a total solar eclipse, bring the eclipse to you! Experience a complete total solar eclipse from start to finish. Feeling impatient? Speed up time or jump ahead. You can even pause time for extended totality! Want to stare at the sun without going blind? You can do that here. Just don’t do that with the real sun!

You can also view the eclipse through a pane of #14 welding glass or a pinhole projector.

Beyond the eclipse itself, the environment is designed to be very relaxing. Watch the day pass from sunrise to sunset and overnight under a clear, cloudless sky. Listen to the wind dynamically blow through the trees on top of a low mountain. Breathe, relax, and enjoy your time here.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 493 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, motion controllers, XBox One Controller, keyboard, standing, sitting

short_description: A simulation of a total solar eclipse, complete with time control, a pane of #14 welding glass, and a pinhole projector.
